column7: Client Solutions Director; Program Manager; Venue Sourcing Lead; Strategic Meetings Mgmt
column8: Best for large corporates. ACC should position as 'value + scale' vs Bangkok/Bali: modern venue, short-haul, beach incentive add-ons, and straightforward contracting. Offer a master venue brief + sample budgets for 200/500/800 pax.
column9: Short-haul Da Nang with big-venue capability: ACC for plenary + gala + breakouts.
column10: Send venue brief + host virtual walkthrough; offer to support their venue sourcing with holding dates and quick quotes.

column7: Head of Client Development; Creative/Production Lead; Group Travel Lead
column8: Pitch operational reliability: single venue for plenary/breakouts/expo; strong back-of-house for production; contingency plans. Offer a 'Da Nang playbook' for event risk and logistics.
column9: ACC is a production-friendly venue for regional meetings—single-venue efficiency in Da Nang.
column10: Send tech pack + rate ranges; propose a test RFP / pilot group.

column7: Regional Travel Manager; MICE/Groups Lead; Procurement Travel & Meetings
column8: Approach via their group bookings/MICE team. ACC can offer preferred rates and ‘bundle’ packages for internal meetings and rewards trips. Provide duty-of-care and vendor compliance details.
column9: Da Nang for your next regional offsite—ACC is the scalable venue partner.
column10: Share venue brief + compliance info; ask for preferred supplier onboarding process.

column8: Malaysia corporates do short-haul incentives; Da Nang is a fresh alternative to Bangkok/Bali. ACC should offer packaged pricing and fast turnaround, and suggest offsite dinners + CSR activities in Hoi An/Da Nang.
column9: Fresh short-haul incentive: Da Nang + ACC for meetings + gala—easy, cost-effective, memorable.
column10: Email intro + propose 2 sample programmes; invite top planner for inspection.

column7: GD MICE Director; Key Account; Group Incentives Manager
column8: Work them as a B2B distribution partner. Provide ACC-ready collateral: photos, floorplans, capacity, menus, and sample budgets. Offer a fixed ‘MICE bundle’ they can plug into proposals.
column9: Let GD MICE quote Da Nang faster: ACC bundled meeting + gala packages with clear rates.
column10: Partner meeting; provide packaged offers and marketing collateral.

column5: Large corporate travel group with MICE capability
column7: MICE Planner; Corporate Accounts; Travel Procurement Lead
column8: Pitch annual corporate calendars: kickoffs, awards nights, dealer incentives. ACC can offer yearly preferred agreements and rate protection. Provide risk and safety plan plus vendor list.
column9: Build your clients’ incentive calendar in Da Nang—ACC gives scale + reliability beyond hotel ballrooms.
column10: Intro + share venue brief + propose preferred agreement.

column5: Dedicated MICE form with MICE email/phone

column8: Provide Chinese-language ACC kit. Emphasize Taiwan–Da Nang nonstop connectivity and ease: short flight, resort + meeting in one. Offer packaged programmes and quick quote SLAs.
column9: 台灣企業獎勵旅遊首選：峴港直飛 + ACC大型會議/晚宴一次到位。
column10: Send Chinese kit + invite key MICE product owner for virtual walkthrough; propose joint promotion.

column8: Position Da Nang as short-haul incentive option from Taiwan. Offer venue assurance and production support; connect them with local Da Nang DMCs for ground ops.
column9: Add Da Nang to your incentive portfolio: ACC as anchor venue + curated experiences in Hoi An/Da Nang.
column10: Intro + propose 1 pilot group; provide Chinese collateral + sample budgets.
